title: Drawing, Design for Art Deco Interior Wall Treatment in Three Sections, ca. 1925
title_raw: Design for Art Deco Interior Wall Treatment in Three Sections
medium: Graphite, brush and brown watercolor, black wash, white gouache on green paperboard
markings: At lower right of image, small [1/2 x 1 in.] Kilemnik stamp in black:  KILEMNIK & Cia/524 FLORIDA
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower right:  E
description: Double pilasters divide wall into three sections with widest space in center.  At center of each section, a series of glass or wrought iron blocks in recessed niche surrounded by a double frame.  A brown marble dado runs along bottom of wall between piers

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Art Deco Interior Wall Treatment in Three Sections, ca. 1925. Graphite, brush and brown watercolor, black wash, white gouache on green paperboard. 
Gift of Maureen Cogan. 1999-39-20
